thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Sheryl (Just call me mom)
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Sheryl (Just call me mom)

author: Sheryl (Just call me mom)
title: Sheryl (Just call me mom)
text:
I'm so glad I found your site. It allows me to send my son, who is in prison, great books at a fraction of what I was paying elsewhere. I may not be able to be with my son all the time but I can still teach him to be a better person and the book in his hand reminds him how much he is loved and missed.
The books get there fast, in good shape and shipping is always free. Thank you!
